content: Write a song chorus where every line starts with the same letter.

(Verse 1)
In the heart of the city, where dreams are made,
I walk with my head held high, nothing to evade.
The streets are alive, with energy so bright,
Each step I take, feels just right.

(Chorus)
Shining stars above, guiding me through the night,
Secrets whispered in the wind, feel so right.
Silent shadows dance, in the moon's soft light,
Soaring high, I take flight.

(Verse 2)
Underneath the bridge, where the river flows,
I find solace in the gentle ebb and flow.
The world seems distant, as I sit alone,
Reflecting on the path I've grown.

(Chorus)
Shimmering waters reflect the sky so wide,
Silhouettes of trees, by the river's side.
Softly singing songs, that only I can hear,
Searching for meaning, year after year.

(Bridge)
Maybe someday, I'll find what I'm seeking,
In the vast expanse, where dreams are meeting.
Until then, I'll keep on walking, hand in hand,
With the rhythm of life, across this land.

(Chorus)
Shadows lengthen, as the sun begins to set,
Silent prayers, for love and luck, Iulet.
Stars start to twinkle, one by one,
So here's to the journey, just begun.

(Outro)
And as I look up, to the heavens above,
I know that I'll keep on moving, keep on loving.
Through highs and lows, in life's great symphony,
I'll keep on shining, brightly, just like me.
